snippet.title: Gryphon - 1894 - C64
snippet.description: It is easy to call Gryphon the technically most impressive game into 1984, the overlapping layers and the parallax scrolling is combined with high quality artwork. It is too bad that the gameplay is not able to live up to the same standards. The worst part is, as mentioned in by the cracker group, that the original had a bug on level 2 which made it impossible to complete the game. I am stuck on level 1 so at least that bug does not impact me.
